posts.name: boyu
posts.cooked:
Our limelight(2+) doesn’t work. It can operate at the first time we used it. Next day we wanted to use limelight,but it’s LED doesn’t work. We tried use usb to connect to the computer,but the computer can’t access it. BTW the LED inside the limelight works and it’s fan works too. There are the photos,if you need any photo or video please tell us.

4063 1108×1477 96.7 KB

4063 1108×1477 96.7 KB

4063 1108×1477 96.7 KB

posts.name: Rishi Rao
posts.cooked: By not being able to access it, do you mean it doesn’t appear in the Balena Etcher imaging tool? If you are attempting to access the web interface, you should run off ethernet.

posts.name: boyu
posts.cooked: Yes,Balena Etcher imaging tool can’t access it. And we used it to connect to the robot’s radio and still can’t find it on the limelight finder.

posts.name: Brad
posts.cooked: Try different cables, different ports and different computers if that doesn’t work Contact support@limelightvision.io .

posts.name: boyu
posts.cooked: OK I will try. Thank you :）

posts.name: Brad
posts.cooked: I think you will find the support very helpful if your limelight is damaged.

posts.name: boyu
posts.cooked: Err… Not yet but I succeed to contract official supporter Thank you!

posts.name: boyu
posts.cooked: Thanks for @Bmongar I contracted to limelight’s customer service. After talk, they decided to give us a new one.

posts.name: rwood
posts.cooked: this is probably a bit late, but another issue we have had imaging the limelight is the need to install a raspberry pi USB driver in windows.

posts.name: system
posts.cooked: This topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
